mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(order_subject_no) FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_user_no = #{userId}

SELECT b.subject_title, a.order_choice, b.subject_status, b.subject_finish_result FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER a JOIN TBL_SUBJECT b ON b.subject_no = a.order_subject_no ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC LIMIT #{itemsPerPage} OFFSET #{start}
SELECT SUM(bo.order_amount) AS totalPoints FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo ON u.user_no = bo.order_user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userId}
SELECT user_name,order_amount,order_choice,order_timestamp FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER join tbl_user on order_user_no=user_no and ORDER_SUBJECT_NO=#{subjectNo} ORDER BY ORDER_TIMESTAMP DESC

SELECT u.user_name AS userName, 'yes' AS choice, SUM(CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'yes' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS sum FROM tbl_betting_order bo JOIN tbl_user u ON bo.order_user_no = u.user_no WHERE bo.order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} GROUP BY u.user_name HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'yes' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT u.user_name AS userName, 'no' AS choice, SUM(CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'no' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END) AS sum FROM tbl_betting_order bo JOIN tbl_user u ON bo.order_user_no = u.user_no WHERE bo.order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} GROUP BY u.user_name HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'no' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END) > 0 ORDER BY choice, sum

SELECT SUM(bo.order_amount) AS totalPoints FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo ON u.user_no = bo.order_user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userId} AND bo.order_timestamp BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND NOW()

-- 사용자의 수익 포인트와 손실 포인트 계산 SELECT u.user_no, bo.order_amount, bo.order_choice, c.subject_total_yes_point, c.subject_total_no_point, c.subject_finish_result, bo.order_timestamp, c.subject_title, c.subject_no, CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'YES' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_yes_point) * c.subject_total_no_point WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'NO' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_no_point) * c.subject_total_yes_point ELSE 0 END AS profit_points, CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'NO' THEN bo.order_amount WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'YES' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END AS loss_points FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo ON u.user_no = bo.order_user_no JOIN TBL_Subject c ON bo.order_subject_no = c.subject_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userId} AND bo.order_timestamp >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND c.subject_status = '완료';

-- 사용자의 수익 포인트와 손실 포인트 계산 SELECT SUM(profit_points) AS total_profit_points, SUM(loss_points) AS total_loss_points, SUM(profit_points) - SUM(loss_points) AS net_profit_points FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'YES' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_yes_point) * c.subject_total_no_point WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'NO' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_no_point) * c.subject_total_yes_point ELSE 0 END AS profit_points, CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'NO' THEN bo.order_amount WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' AND c.subject_finish_result = 'YES' THEN bo.order_amount ELSE 0 END AS loss_points FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo ON u.user_no = bo.order_user_no JOIN TBL_Subject c ON bo.order_subject_no = c.subject_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userId} AND bo.order_timestamp >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND c.subject_status = '완료' ) AS UserBettingData;

SELECT u.user_no, bo.order_amount, bo.order_choice, c.subject_total_yes_point, c.subject_total_no_point, c.subject_title, c.subject_no, c.subject_finish_result, bo.order_timestamp, CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_yes_point) * c.subject_total_no_point WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_no_point) * c.subject_total_yes_point ELSE 0 END AS current_position_value FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo ON u.user_no = bo.order_user_no JOIN TBL_Subject c ON bo.order_subject_no = c.subject_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userId} AND c.subject_status = '진행중';

SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN bo.order_choice = 'YES' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_yes_point) * c.subject_total_no_point WHEN bo.order_choice = 'NO' THEN (bo.order_amount / c.subject_total_no_point) * c.subject_total_yes_point ELSE 0 END ) AS total_position_value FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_BETTING_ORDER bo ON u.user_no = bo.order_user_no JOIN TBL_Subject c ON bo.order_subject_no = c.subject_no WHERE c.subject_status = '진행중';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_betting_order ( order_amount, order_choice, order_subject_no, order_user_no ) VALUES ( #{orderAmount}, #{orderChoice}, #{orderSubjectNo}, #{orderUserNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_AMOUNT , A.ORDER_CHOICE , A.ORDER_TIMESTAMP , B.USER_NO , B.USER_NAME , C.SUBJECT_NO , C.SUBJECT_TITLE , D.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NO , D.ATTACHMENT_FILE_ADDRESS , E.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NO , E.ATTACHMENT_FILE_ADDRESS FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.ORDER_USER_NO = B.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_SUBJECT C ON A.ORDER_SUBJECT_NO = C.SUBJECT_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT D ON A.ORDER_USER_NO = D.ATTACHMENT_USER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT E ON A.ORDER_SUBJECT_NO = E.SUBJECT_NO WHERE B.USER_AUTHORITY = '회원' ORDER BY A.ORDER_TIMESTAMP DESC

WITH RECURSIVE time_intervals AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(MAX(order_timestamp), INTERVAL MINUTE(MAX(order_timestamp)) MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS step FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 1 HOUR), step + 1 FROM time_intervals WHERE step < 10 ), order_sums AS ( SELECT order_timestamp, SUM(order_amount) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'Yes' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_yes_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'No' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_no_amount FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} ), aggregated_orders AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS hourly_timestamp, MAX(total_amount) AS total_amount, MAX(total_yes_amount) AS total_yes_amount, MAX(total_no_amount) AS total_no_amount FROM order_sums GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(order_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') ) SELECT ti.displayTime, ROUND(COALESCE(ao.total_yes_amount / ao.total_amount * 100, 0), 2) AS yesRate, ROUND(COALESCE(ao.total_no_amount / ao.total_amount * 100, 0),2) AS noRate FROM time_intervals ti LEFT JOIN aggregated_orders ao ON ao.hourly_timestamp = ti.displayTime ORDER BY ti.displayTime DESC

WITH RECURSIVE time_intervals AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(MAX(order_timestamp), INTERVAL MINUTE(MAX(order_timestamp)) MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS step FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 6 HOUR), step + 1 FROM time_intervals WHERE step < 10 ), order_sums AS ( SELECT order_timestamp, SUM(order_amount) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'Yes' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_yes_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'No' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_no_amount FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} ), aggregated_orders AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS hourly_timestamp, MAX(total_amount) AS total_amount, MAX(total_yes_amount) AS total_yes_amount, MAX(total_no_amount) AS total_no_amount FROM order_sums GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(order_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') ) SELECT ti.displayTime, ROUND(COALESCE(ao.total_yes_amount / ao.total_amount * 100, 0), 2) AS yesRate, ROUND(COALESCE(ao.total_no_amount / ao.total_amount * 100, 0),2) AS noRate FROM time_intervals ti LEFT JOIN aggregated_orders ao ON ao.hourly_timestamp = ti.displayTime ORDER BY ti.displayTime DESC

WITH RECURSIVE time_intervals AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(MAX(order_timestamp), INTERVAL HOUR (MAX(order_timestamp)) HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS step FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 1 DAY), step + 1 FROM time_intervals WHERE step < 10 ), order_sums AS ( SELECT order_timestamp, SUM(order_amount) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'Yes' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_yes_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'No' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_no_amount FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} ), aggregated_orders AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS hourly_timestamp, MAX(total_amount) AS total_amount, MAX(total_yes_amount) AS total_yes_amount, MAX(total_no_amount) AS total_no_amount FROM order_sums GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(order_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') ) SELECT ti.displayTime, ROUND(COALESCE(ao.total_yes_amount / ao.total_amount * 100, 0), 2) AS yesRate, ROUND(COALESCE(ao.total_no_amount / ao.total_amount * 100, 0),2) AS noRate FROM time_intervals ti LEFT JOIN aggregated_orders ao ON ao.hourly_timestamp = ti.displayTime ORDER BY ti.displayTime DESC

WITH RECURSIVE time_intervals AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(MAX(order_timestamp), INTERVAL HOUR(MAX(order_timestamp)) HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS step FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 1 WEEK), step + 1 FROM time_intervals WHERE step < 10 ), order_sums AS ( SELECT order_timestamp, SUM(order_amount) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'Yes' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_yes_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'No' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_no_amount FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} ) SELECT ti.displayTime, ROUND(COALESCE(os.total_yes_amount / os.total_amount * 100, 0), 2) AS yesRate, ROUND(COALESCE(os.total_no_amount / os.total_amount * 100, 0), 2) AS noRate FROM time_intervals ti LEFT JOIN order_sums os ON os.order_timestamp BETWEEN ti.displayTime AND DATE_ADD(ti.displayTime, INTERVAL 1 WEEK) -- 1주일로 수정 ORDER BY ti.displayTime DESC

WITH RECURSIVE time_intervals AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(MAX(order_timestamp), INTERVAL HOUR(MAX(order_timestamp)) HOUR), '%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') AS displayTime, 1 AS step FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} UNION ALL SELECT DATE_SUB(displayTime, INTERVAL 1 MONTH), step + 1 FROM time_intervals WHERE step < 10 ), order_sums AS ( SELECT order_timestamp, SUM(order_amount) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'Yes' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_yes_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN order_choice = 'No' THEN order_amount ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY order_timestamp) AS total_no_amount FROM TBL_BETTING_ORDER WHERE order_subject_no = #{subjectNo} ) SELECT ti.displayTime, ROUND(COALESCE(os.total_yes_amount / os.total_amount * 100, 0), 2) AS yesRate, ROUND(COALESCE(os.total_no_amount / os.total_amount * 100, 0), 2) AS noRate FROM time_intervals ti LEFT JOIN order_sums os ON os.order_timestamp BETWEEN ti.displayTime AND DATE_ADD(ti.displayTime, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) -- 1달로 수정 ORDER BY ti.displayTime DESC
